channel.title: Portforwarding help :( Will Rep++
channel.description: OK. First off. I don't have a router. I don't have cable/ADSL internet. I have a USB Internet Modem. I have windows vista. I have uTorrent! But can't portforward with it. I have seen people run a large server off a USB Modem before. I just want to learn how!!!! Will Rep++

item.title: Portforwarding help :( Will Rep++
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

You shouldnt need to portforward.

Read full topic

item.title: Portforwarding help :( Will Rep++
item.dc:creator: @Tension_Ltd Tension Ltd
item.description:
@Tension_Ltd wrote:

I have heard with a modem you don’t need to portfoward and with the Utorrent, are you sure you have done everything alright.

If you want me to check, send a pm to me with teamviewer details.

Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Portforwarding help :( Will Rep++
item.dc:creator: @Mee0345 Mee0345
item.description:
@Mee0345 wrote:

OK.
First off.
I don’t have a router.
I don’t have cable/ADSL internet.
I have a USB Internet Modem.
I have windows vista.
I have uTorrent! But can’t portforward with it.
I have seen people run a large server off a USB Modem before. I just want to learn how!!!
Will Rep++

Read full topic
